page.title: 07LIFE ON A MENDIP DAIRY FARM
page.content: {Life on Bristol Plain Farm is rigorous nd demanding . Dairy cattle require constant daily attention and the farmer has to be mobile in all weather so Land Rovers and tractors are vital equipment . A typical day will start at 0600 hours and finish at 1830 hours. Milking is carried out morning and afternoons and a herdsman the only employee helps with this. Afternoons usually involve the mending of fences or walls, care of beef stock or the repair of broken farm buildings. The farmers family also work on the farm. The family enjoy the peace and quietness of this isolated spot but have little leisure time. September brings a brief rest but even so,the farmer has only taken 3 holidays in 15 years.
